Source.Name: perl-time-hires
Source.Summary: Time::HiRes - High resolution alarm, sleep, gettimeofday, interval timers
Source.Description: Implement usleep, ualarm, and gettimeofday for Perl, as well as wrappers to implement time, sleep, and alarm that know about non-integral seconds.

Package.Name: perl-time-hires

Package.Description: Implement usleep, ualarm, and gettimeofday for Perl, as well as wrappers to implement time, sleep, and alarm that know about non-integral seconds.
